$:/plugins/kookma/utility/edittemplates/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/edittemplates/tiddler-size
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/edittemplates/.text:
\function .fieldnames() text
\function .lines() [.fieldnames[]] :map[<..currentTiddler>get<currentTiddler>splitregexp[\n]count[]else[0]] [enlist<fieldnames>count[]else[0]] +[sum[]]
\function .words() [.fieldnames[]] :map[<..currentTiddler>get<currentTiddler>splitregexp[\n]splitregexp[\s+]count[]else[0]] [enlist<fieldnames>splitregexp[\s+]count[]else[0]] +[sum[]]
\function .bytes() [.fieldnames[]] :map[<..currentTiddler>get<currentTiddler>else[]length[]] [enlist<fieldnames>length[]else[0]] +[sum[]]

<%if [{$:/config/EditTemplate/Visibility/$:/plugins/kookma/utility/edittemplates/tiddler-size}match[show]] %>
	<$let popid={{{ [[$:/temp/TiddlyTools/Templates/Size/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>addsuffix<qualify>] }}} >
		<$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-utility-tiddlersize-btn" popup=<<popid>> tooltip="show field sizes">
			 Tiddler text: <<.lines>> lines, <<.words>> words, <<.bytes>> bytes {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <!-- only text field statistics -->
		</$button>
		<$reveal state=<<popid>> type="popup" class="tc-drop-down kk-utility-tiddlersize-dropdwon">
		<$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/utility/tiddlerInfo/tiddler-size]]">
			<<tiddlerSize>> <!-- full tiddler statistics -->
		</$importvariables>	
		</$reveal>
	</$let>
<%endif%>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/procedures/cus.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/procedures/custom-transclusion
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/procedures/cus.text:
\procedure source-link(tiddler, caption)
<$tiddler  tiddler={{{[<tiddler>get[title]else<currentTiddler>]}}} >
<$link/>
<$transclude $variable="code" language={{{ [<currentTiddler>get[type]else[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]] }}} src={{!!text}} caption=<<caption>>/>
</$tiddler>
\end

\procedure content(tiddler)
<$tiddler  tiddler={{{[<tiddler>get[title]else<currentTiddler>]}}} >
<$link/>
<$transclude $field="text" $mode="block"/>
</$tiddler>
\end

\procedure description(tiddler)
<$tiddler  tiddler={{{[<tiddler>get[title]else<currentTiddler>]}}} >
<dl>
<dt><$link/></dt>
<dd><$transclude $field="description"/></dd>
</dl>
</$tiddler>
\end

\procedure fields(tiddler)
<$tiddler  tiddler={{{[<tiddler>get[title]else<currentTiddler>]}}} >
<$link/>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TiddlerFields"/>
</$tiddler>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/procedures/wik.text:
\procedure wikitext-example(src)
<$transclude $variable="copy-to-clipboard-above-right" src=<>/> <$codeblock code=<>/>

That renders as:

<$transclude $variable="src" $mode="block"/>
\end \procedure wikitext-example-with-html(src)
<$transclude $variable="copy-to-clipboard-above-right" src=<>/> <$codeblock code=<>/>

That renders as:

<$transclude $variable="src" $mode="block"/>

... and the underlying HTML is:

<$wikify name="html" text=<> output="html"> <$codeblock code=<>/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/reader-mode/st.text:
<!-- this tiddler is a modified $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/tiddlyweb/readonly from Tiddlyweb plugin -->
\procedure button-selector(title) <$text text=`button.$(title)$, .tc-drop-down button.$(title)$, div.$(title)$` />

\procedure hide-edit-controls()
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fclone>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fdelete>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fedit>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fnew-here>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fnew-journal-here>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fimport>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fmanager>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fnew-image>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fnew-journal>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fnew-tiddler>>{
	display: none;
}
\end

\procedure hide-user-selected-controls()
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fcontrol-panel>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fsave-wiki>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Finfo>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fplugins\%2Fkookma\%2Fcommander\%2Fbuttons\%2Fpagecontrol>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fplugins\%2Fkookma\%2Ftrashbin\%2Fui\%2Ftoolbar-button>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fplugins\%2Fkookma\%2Ffavorites\%2Fui\%2Fbuttons\%2Fadd-remove>>,
<<button-selector tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fplugins\%2Fkookma\%2Futility\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2FViewFields>> {
	display: none;
}
\end

<$reveal state="$:/status/IsReaderMode" type="match" text="yes" default="no"> <!-- by default reader mode is off -->

\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock

<<hide-edit-controls>>
<<hide-user-selected-controls>>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/readme.text:
; Utility plugin
The utility plugin objective is to provide set of tools for authors. These tools includes simple transclusions, show raw contents of tiddlers, reader mode, wikitext macros, show fields in view mode, linkify, code, docit, and much more!

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Utility/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Utility

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/source-toggle-button
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.text:
<!-- These are those tiddlers are shown by default as code using $:/Core cascades-->
\function system-excluded-filter()
[tag[$:/tags/PageTemplate]] [tag[$:/tags/EditTemplate]] [tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]] [tag[$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut]] [tag[$:/tags/ImportPreview]] [tag[$:/tags/EditPreview]][tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]] [tag[$:/tags/Actions]]

[prefix[$:/boot/]] [prefix[$:/core/macros]] [prefix[$:/core/save/]] [prefix[$:/core/templates/]]  [prefix[$:/config/]] [prefix[$:/info/]] [prefix[$:/language/]] [prefix[$:/languages/]] [prefix[$:/snippets/]]  [prefix[$:/info/]] [prefix[$:/state/]] [prefix[$:/status/]] [prefix[$:/temp/]] 

[field:plugin-type[import]]
[field:code-body[yes]]
[has[plugin-draft]]
[has[plugin-type]]

[tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]] [type[text/css]]
[type[text/css]] [type[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]]
[type[application/json]] [type[application/javascript]]

\end system-excluded-filter

\define show-tiddler-source(open:"")
<details  title="Show/hide tiddler source" class="kk-utility-details" $open$>
<summary>Source</summary>
<$transclude $variable="code" language={{{ [{!!type}else[xml]] }}} src={{!!text}} />
</details>
\end

<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<folded-state>>text=hide tag=div retain=yes animate=yes>
<%if [{$:/config/ViewTemplate/Visibility/$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/source-toggle-button}match[show]] %>
<%if [all[current]has[title]] -[subfilter{$:/config/Utility/SourceToggleButton/Exclude-filter}] -[function[system-excluded-filter]] %>
	<%if [tag[show-content]] [tag[show-source]] [subfilter{$:/config/Utility/SourceToggleButton/Extra-filter}] :and[match<currentTiddler>] %>
		<<show-tiddler-source open>>
	<%else%>
		<<show-tiddler-source>>
	<%endif%>
<%endif%>
<%endif%>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/view-fields
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.description: Toggle field handling in view mode
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplates/.text:
<$reveal type=match stateTitle="$:/state/utility/view-fields" stateField=text default="hide" text=show tag=div class="kk-ut-viewfields">

<$vars newFieldNameTiddler=<<qualify "$:/temp/NewFieldName">>
newFieldValueTiddler=<<qualify "$:/temp/NewFieldValue">>  
searchListState=<<qualify "$:/temp/searchListState">> 
storeTitle=<<qualify "$:/temp/storeTitle">> 
>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/fields"/>
</$vars>

</$reveal>
